@graph.name: Route4Me Integrations - Last Mile Integration Platform - Route4Me
@graph.description: Create mission-critical business processes with Route4Me integrations. Connect your ERP, telematics, e-commerce, and business systems for automated last mile delivery workflows.
@graph.keywords: route optimization, fleet management, enterprise integration, last mile automation, ERP integration, telematics gateway, order management, API integration, SAP integration, NetSuite integration, e-commerce integration, business process automation, logistics integration, supply chain optimization

@graph.name: Route4Me Integration Platform for Last Mile Transportation
@graph.description: Route4Me Integration Platform creates bullet-proof, mission-critical business processes with comprehensive integrations that enable end-to-end last mile automation. Connect Route4Me to your business applications for seamless last mile delivery workflows through enterprise-grade APIs and SDKs. The platform integrates with order management systems, telematics providers, ERP systems like SAP and NetSuite, and e-commerce platforms including Shopify, WooCommerce, and Magento. Route4Me provides industry-standard, low latency, high availability RESTful APIs and SDKs that integrate cleanly into your existing technology stack. The Telematics Gateway enables advanced analytics by measuring actual performance against planned routes, while order management integrations support dynamic order insertion and capacity optimization for enhanced customer experience.

@graph.name: Access Developer Portal
@graph.description: Access Route4Me Developer Portal for complete documentation and online access to modern APIs and SDKs

@graph.name: API and SDK Features
